description: Cap Veggie is an initiative founded by Laure Mardoc, aimed at modernizing French cuisine by integrating quality vegetarian options into institutional and commercial catering. With a focus on training chefs and kitchen teams, creating innovative recipes, and providing consultancy services, Cap Veggie seeks to reconcile traditional French gastronomy with plant-based cuisine. The initiative addresses the growing demand for sustainable food practices while ensuring that vegetarian meals remain enjoyable and accessible. Over the next decade, Cap Veggie aspires to ensure that every restaurant in France offers high-quality vegetarian choices, contributing significantly to the food transition.
name: Cap Veggie
